description:
Kadota Kyouhei is friends with http://anidb.net/ch13869 [Karisawa], http://anidb.net/ch13870 [Yumasaki] and http://anidb.net/ch14866 [Togusa]. The quartet always hangs out together and were formerly part of http://anidb.net/ch14887 [Blue Squares] and now http://anidb.net/ch14864 [Dollars].
It was them who saved http://anidb.net/ch14873 [Saki] from the clutches of the Blue Squares.
name: Kadota Kyouhei
